issue.title: GUI resize tool doesn't work for all shapes

content.raw:
From pull request #1475:

Scaling still works only for centred simple shapes consisting of a single geometry type.

You can try to scale the Beer model for example and it won't work because it is not centred. Then go into the model editor, centre the link and save it as a new model, and then scaling should work.
